channel.title: Client keeps freezing!
channel.description:
ok when i try to play my server (figmentscape source) on the client drowning client and i go into my bank scroll down to a certain point and it freezes... here is a pic of the error in the clients run.bat
[img]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk41/h0pe5/run.jpg[/img]

item.title: Client keeps freezing!
item.dc:creator: @Enjoi_Sk8 Enjoi Sk8
item.description:
@Enjoi_Sk8 wrote:

so if i wanted to make a client and use figmentscape then i would have to configure the client or source to each other?

then if so tell me a good source w/ client that is almost like figmentscape like not alot of stuff that can b easily editted

Read full topic

item.title: Client keeps freezing!
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Enjoi Sk8, post:3, topic:222356”]ok tyvm at 1st when i checked my bank (put in a full bank of silab items) for ne nulls i found 1 here and there then when i scrolled down it just froze so i guess too many nulls so thnx very much i appreciate it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 07:09:04 pm[/size][hr]and here i thought i found a gr8 client that actually doesnt have ne nulls but o well…
o and if u no a client that has little or no nulls with figmentscape then plz post link that would b gr8![/quote]silab is the only one because figmentscape has silab items…

Read full topic

ok tyvm at 1st when i checked my bank (put in a full bank of silab items) for ne nulls i found 1 here and there then when i scrolled down it just froze so i guess too many nulls so thnx very much i appreciate it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 07:09:04 pm[/size][hr]and here i thought i found a gr8 client that actually doesnt have ne nulls but o well…

item.title: Client keeps freezing!
item.dc:creator: @Da_Boondocks Da Boondocks
item.description:
@Da_Boondocks wrote:

Lol this happens to me,when u use someone client that is for a specific server it dosn’t have all the silab items and there could be so many nulls that it can freeze it…or the server ur on with the dif client might have some edited items that lag you out.

i recomend you use silabs at www.client.silabsoft.org if u didnt know…

Read full topic
